snippet: Catherine Greig, the companion of James (Whitey) Bulger, will also plead guilty to credit-card and identity fraud. Mr. Bulger is accused of 19 murders.
abstract: Catherine Greig, the companion of the Boston mobster James (Whitey) Bulger, is expected to plead guilty to charges that she helped him evade capture for 16 years, as well as to credit-card and identity fraud.
lead_paragraph: Catherine Greig, the companion of James (Whitey) Bulger, will also plead guilty to credit-card and identity fraud. Mr. Bulger is accused of 19 murders.

headline.seo: Bulger’s Companion to Plead Guilty to Helping Him
headline.main: Boston Mobster’s Companion to Plead Guilty to Helping Him Evade Capture
headline.print_headline: Boston Mobster’s Companion to Plead Guilty to Helping Him Evade Capture
